Deemos moves slightly to the side, but the blade slashes across his neck.
Mech fluid spills through the air. Deemos falls backwards and raise sone
hand.

Deemos: No! Mercy!

Deemos slowly smiles almost innocently, waiting to see if Aerotaur was
tricked by this...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 25, 2000 1:04 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix


> OOC: sorry about that last one
>
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "NOOOO!  YOU WILL REGRET THAT!!!!"  He glances around.  "I don't know
who
> you are but take care of them."  He comes to the realization that he has a
> weight strapped to his back he glances over his right shoulder and sees
the
> glint of a blade.  It is the same staff he has in the winged centaur mode.
> He draws it and rushes at Deemos twirling it and bringing it down in an
arc
> that could take his head of.
>
>
>
>
